channel.title: Hidden Hat Impossibility [Fixed]
channel.description: Hi, I posted this as a small note in my other bug thread, but I wanted to post it separately because it's an achievement breaker. Once you get the hat to the Lambda Core teleportation puzzle... I throw it through the portal, and it lands on the spinning platform. I wait for it to come back around and follow through the portal. It was at that point that I found out I couldn't interract with the hat while it was on the platform. I could shoot it off and pick it up below, but there was no way to get it through the portals.

item.title: Hidden Hat Impossibility [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: BerZerK
item.description:
I found out that same thing on the first rotating platform. I used a couple of barrels in the previous hallway (marked “Coolant”) to get over the “fence” in the first portal room. That way I could carry it, and throw it along. The problem on the first platform didn’t seem to be an issue on the next two(?) platforms. I managed to get all the way to the last portal to Xen, but throwing it in there didn’t give me the achievement anyway. :[

Anyone got a solution for that?

Edit: Note that you have to time it carefully over the “fence”, to soon and you’ll get smashed for some reason. Collision issue I guess.
